scripts.setup: npx lerna bootstrap && npx lerna run build
scripts.start:node: npx lerna exec --scope=@paid-cloud/contracts -- npm run node
scripts.run:deploy: npx lerna exec --scope=@paid-cloud/contracts -- npm run deploy

scripts.run:transfer: npx lerna exec --scope=@paid-cloud/contracts -- npm run transfer

scripts.start:client: npx lerna exec --scope=@paid-cloud/client -- npm run start
